etymology.description: semantic 女(女) (nǚ, "woman") + phonetic 里(里) (lǐ, "village") = related to women -> wife of a younger brother
etymology.interpretation: The character 娌(lǐ) incorporates 女(女) (nǚ, "woman"), indicating a connection to women, and 里(里) (lǐ, "village") as the phonetic component, suggesting familial relations within a community, which in this context refers to the wife of a younger brother.

examples.chinese: 我弟娌待人宽厚(我弟娌待人寬厚)。
examples.english: My younger brother’s wife treats people kindly.

examples.chinese: 他们家族和睦(他們家族和睦)，弟娌尽显贤淑(弟娌盡顯賢淑)。
examples.pinyin: Tāmen jiāzú hémù, dì lí jǐnxiǎn xiánshū.
examples.english: Their family is harmonious, and my younger brother’s wife shows her virtuous character.
